alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 28 at 5:06AM AKDT until March 28 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow reducing visibility to one half mile or less at times. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will increase rapidly this morning and cause blowing snow with low visibility. The winds will decrease this evening and conditions will improve then.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
